name: PolyCombat
description:
Welcome to PolyCombat!

The goal of this game is simple - shoot the different polygons coming at you and get as high a score as possible!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move around

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

This game was inspired in many ways by Amorphous.

Music by the Classified Composer.

I made this game in one day, so don't expect this to be a megahit. But still, enjoy!
